title: thiruvazhundoor vaaz
sahitya:
tiruvazhundoor vaazh maadhavaa - shree vaasudEvaa

(tiru)



anupallavi



parivaay ranganaayaki maruvum jagannaayakaa

parivaay ranganaadaa sarasija malarppaadaa

(tiru)



caraNam



kaliyin koDumaiyaal nin karuNai tiram marandu

kalaha vizhiyaar kaama kaDal veezhvEnai aaTkoLLu

ulagu pugazh kaavEri nadiyin vaDa paal eerEzh

ulagai aLandu veNNai unDu tonDa parava

(tiru)
